meanings.definition: In a bold or daring manner
meanings.sent1: She jumped audaciously off the high diving board.
meanings.sent2: He audaciously challenged the school bully to a game of chess.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel audaciously stole a peanut from the picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: The young artist painted audaciously, using vibrant colors and bold strokes.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter audaciously rushed into the burning building to save the trapped kitten.

meanings.definition: Showing a willingness to take risks or offend others
meanings.sent1: Her audacious decision to quit her job and travel the world surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The audacious plan to climb the mountain without proper gear was risky.
meanings.sent3: The audacious puppy barked at the much larger dog, unaware of the danger.
meanings.sent4: His audacious fashion choices always turned heads wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The audacious entrepreneur invested all her savings in the new business venture.

meanings.definition: Done with confidence and a lack of fear
meanings.sent1: The audacious student volunteered to present the project to the entire class.
meanings.sent2: She audaciously sang in front of a large audience without hesitation.
meanings.sent3: The audacious chef experimented with unusual ingredients in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The audacious driver maneuvered through traffic with ease and skill.
meanings.sent5: The audacious explorer ventured into the uncharted jungle without any hesitation.
